entry.definition: meaningful numerical representation of a physical parameter that is not the actual value of the physical parameter
code value with no quantitative meaning, used to represent a physical quantity
value in physical units of the quantity being measured

data, usually a physical measurement, used to support the calculation of the primary physicalMeasurement coverages in the dataset (e.g. grid of aerosol optical thickness used in the calculation of a sea surface temperature product).
data used to characterize the quality of the physicalMeasurement coverages in the dataset. Typically included in a gmi:QE_CoverageResult.
reference information used to support the calculation or use of the physicalMeasurement coverages in the dataset (e.g. grids of latitude/longitude used to geolocate the physical measurements).
resources with values that are calculated using a model rather than being observed or calculated from observations.
data used to provide coordinate axis values
